name: Draw.io
description: Draw.io is a free online diagramming tool that allows users to create flowcharts, network diagrams, UML diagrams, and other types of visual representations. It features a user-friendly interface with drag-and-drop functionality and supports collaboration through cloud storage or local filesystem integration.

situations: want imagery to support a project

notes: Integrates with Confluence/Jira or can be used standalone.
Good for UML, flowcharts, and other architecture diagrams.
